thag18.1:5.4: aṅguli cettha → aṅgulī pettha (bj, pts1ed, pts2ed, mr)
thag18.1:6.1: Kuṭṭamūlañca → kuḍḍamūlañca (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed); kuḍḍamūlaṃ vā (pts2ed)
thag18.1:26.3: taṃsadiso → hīnohaṃ sadiso (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts1ed, pts2ed)
thag18.1:27.4: tañce → taṃ ve (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts2ed); tañ ca (pts1ed)
